price: "Salama!" Hiyo ndiyo kauli itokayo kwa Mola Mlezi Mwenye kurehemu.
footnotes: Wataambiwa: "Salama", kuwa ni kauli iliyo toka kwa Mola Mlezi Mwenye kurehemu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
